snippet: After nearly a month of reports of gunshots being fired at vehicles and more than 100 tips, authorities announced charges Friday against a Kansas City-area man suspected in connection with about a dozen highway shootings that wounded three people....

headline.print_headline: Man Charged in Kansas City-Area Highway Shootings
headline.main: Man Charged in Kansas City-Area Highway Shootings

lead_paragraph: After nearly a month of reports of gunshots being fired at vehicles and more than 100 tips, authorities announced charges Friday against a Kansas City-area man suspected in connection with about a dozen highway shootings that wounded three people.
